div.p: Horizon Science Academy Denison is a public charter school serving K-8th grades that opened in 2004. We provide our students with an innovative world class education, rich in math, science and technology. Horizon Science Academy Denison focuses on preparing students to become bold inquirers, problem solvers and ethical leaders, with skills ready to meet the challenges of a competitive global workforce.

div.p: Horizon has a reputation for providing a good education. It is also a safe environment. At Horizon, my child is encouraged to broaden her mind and try new things.

The teachers are supportive, encouraging, and challenge my children to move out of their comfort zones and achieve greatness. I am so happy we found Horizon and look forward to a long relationship with the school.
Of the atmosphere, the staff, the education that is taught, scholarships offered, and professionalism of the staff.

div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-2 vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs

p.span: Horizon Science Academy Denison School is managed by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.

p.font: The Momentum Award is presented by the State Board of Education and recognizes schools for exceeding expectations in student growth for the year. Schools must earn straight A’s on all Value-Added measures on the report card. The school or district must have at least two Value-Added subgroups of students, which includes gifted, lowest 20% in achievement, and students with disabilities.
